item.title: GERN
item.description: score:178 Chances: Geron Corporation has received positive regulatory and study updates, indicating potential growth in the near future. The FDA’s potential expansion of use for Geron’s multiple myeloma cell therapies and Pfizer’s gene therapy work could lead to increased market opportunities. The FDA’s backing of Geron’s pipeline candidate, imetelstat, for the treatment of transfusion-dependent anemia is a significant positive development.
